issue.title: [Rust] Merge parquet-rs codebase
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4028](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4028). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Initial donation of [parquet-rs](https://github.com/sunchao/parquet-rs), an Apache Parquet implementation in Rust. This subjects to ASF IP clearance.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4028?focusedCommentId=16723386) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3050
